Description:
Contemporary Charm
A testament to quality and style, this character weatherboard emanates high-calibre class. Period décor and modern elements offset the layout to perfection which takes into consideration the need for entertaining as well as reclining. Striking in appearance and functionality, the kitchen is well-equipped and easily services the open-plan family and meals area. A living room (with gas heater) provides for more intimate occasions while a covered deck is perfect for outdoor get-togethers. Excellent family zoning places the luxuriant bedrooms at the front of the home alongside a family bathroom. An additional bathroom is situated at the rear, well-placed for guests. As one would expect from a home of this standard, polished floorboards, split system heating/cooling, solar panels, an attic and a remote garage accessible from the rear lane round out the features list. Adding to the home’s incredible appeal, the superb locale places you close to Coburg West Primary School, Strathmore Secondary College, public transport and shops.
Insights: 34 Bruce Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Stylishly updated for your immediate enjoyment, this stunning low maintenance villa is the perfect choice for first time buyers, savvy investors or those downsizing. Open the front door and be greeted by a generous and light filled living/dining zone, adjoining a stunning kitchen, featuring sleek stainless-steel appliances, a dishwasher & breakfast bar. Recently polished timber floors seamlessly complement its two spacious bedrooms, each comprising a substantial built in robe, and which are serviced by a well-kept central bathroom featuring a separate shower & bath. Those who like to entertain will be delighted by a spacious private courtyard, a great place to host family & friends. This outstanding package is made complete by its 'A1' location, only a short walk to Coburg Train Station, Sydney Rd shopping precinct and the number 19 Tram on Sydney Rd.

Description:
Exceptional Home In Excellent Location!
In a peaceful leafy location, this lovely elevated brick veneer home set on 237 square metres (approx.) of land is a must-see for first home buyers, down-sizers or investors alike.
Featuring 2 good sized bedrooms, quality kitchen with adjoining meals / lounge area, central bathroom, separate laundry, huge outdoor entertainment decking area and a large garage plus additional space for off-street parking.
A superb opportunity close to Hutchinson Place Reserve, Coburg High School, Merri Creek Trail, Shops and Public Transport.

Description:
Easy-Living Style with Grand Design
A unique slice of Coburg's history, this landmark Victorian presents an outstanding low-maintenance lifestyle/investment opportunity with its distinctive period elegance, quality features and enviably convenient location. Towering ceilings throughout, the home's light-filled interior comprises two bedrooms (extra-large master) and stylish central bathroom, open-plan living/meals area complemented by an updated kitchen complete with dishwasher. Other highlights include gas heating and split-system air conditioning, instantaneous gas hot water service and internal laundry facilities, plus a spacious and sunny rear courtyard with high fences for added privacy, as well as video intercom and secure off-street parking space on title via gated driveway (remote-controlled). Close to a range of attractions including public transport options, cafes and shops, popular parks, Coburg West and St Fidelis primary schools, as well as easy access to Citylink/Tullamarine Freeway. In Conjunction with Ian Reid Vendor Advocacy.
Insights: 1/86 Gordon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Retro Style & Beautifully Appointed
One of only five in a unique boutique block, this vibrant villa is certain to make a lasting impression with its bold architecture, tasteful renovations and prime location in Coburg's exclusive Moreland Park Estate precinct. Bathed in natural light, the home's vogue interior showcases two double bedrooms (both with oversized robes) and sleek central bathroom, spacious open living/dining area enhanced by a vaulted roofline and floor-to-ceiling windows. Add to this a first-class kitchen complete with tiled splashbacks and soft-close cabinetry, gas cooking premium appliances and the added versatility of an island bench. Other stand-out features include split-system heating and cooling, laundry facilities and separate WC, gas Hws plus a private rear courtyard with extensive paving as well as an off-street parking space - all on title. Walking distance to Nicholson Street/Moreland Road trams, local parks and Merri Creek trails, it's also close to primary and secondary schools, as well as easy access to Moreland Station, Sydney Road shops, cafes and restaurants. Low-maintenance perfection!
In conjunction with Australian Professionals Property Service Pty Ltd.
Insights: 4/106 Rennie Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH TOWNHOUSE!
In one of Coburg's best pockets is this majestic newly built townhouse with style & quality that is sure to impress. With just a short stroll to Sydney Road, Bell Street, Nicholson Street and minutes' walk to Coburg Train Station, Sydney Road tram and Bell Street bus interchange and Upfield Bike Path, this property is surrounded by numerous shops and cafes!
Boasting a light filled open space living area with polished Engineered Hardwood floors/stairs and refrigerated ducted heating and cooling throughout. Open plan kitchen/meals area with astonishing features including 900mm Smeg appliances, dishwasher, 40mm Calcutta stone bench tops with a waterfall finish and complemented with Calcutta splash back, under mount sink with pendent lights and an abundance of cupboard space and a walk-in pantry.
Featuring three generous sized bedrooms, being upstairs and all include built in robes. The master bedroom has a stylish ensuite, which is at most convenient and wanted by many. The bedrooms are serviced by a retreat and a modern central designer bathroom with a separate shower & toilet.
Completing this beautiful home is an outdoor decking entertaining area, single garage, separate laundry, powder room downstairs, LED downlights throughout, alarm and in addition 2 Pac cabinets.
This property is truly a masterpiece, come and see for yourself!
Insights: 15 Budds Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

A Wonderful Opportunity in a Prized Coburg East Location
This single level villa unit is an exceptional example of a superb first home, investment or downsizer.
Comprising two generous sized bedrooms (both with BIR's), central bathroom with separate bath & shower, separate WC, laundry, large front lounge and a neat sunny kitchen & meals area with access to an oversized North-facing, low maintenance courtyard - Perfect for entertaining with family & friends.
Make this your first home, additional investment or an affordable downsize option. With a single lock-up garage, walking distance to Sydney Road trams & cafes, close to Coburg Station, local schools (Zoned to Coburg High School), and popular restaurants, it ticks all the boxes!

Description:
Versatile Style in a Picture-Perfect Setting
Moments from Merri Creek trails and parkland in one of Coburg's most exclusive and tightly-held pockets, this one-of-a-kind period home delivers an idyllic inner-urban family lifestyle with its flexible floorplan, premium features and delightful garden surrounds. Tastefully enhanced and expanded while retaining its authentic period charm, the home's light-filed interior comprises four bedrooms (master with WIR), stylish main bathroom and impressive ensuite with Bali-style spa bath and double shower. Versatile living zones include a spacious lounge (or home office/guest room) with its own second entrance, open-plan family/dining area complemented by a custom kitchen with breakfast bar, ample storage space, Ariston cooking appliances and integrated AEG dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating and split-system a/c, solid hardwood floors, stained timberwork and original Art Deco ceilings, solar power, rainwater tank, plus a wonderfully spacious yet private decked entertaining area, established gardens and off-street parking for up to three cars. Positioned to perfection, it's also close to Nicholson Street trams, primary and secondary schools (zoned to Coburg High School), Sydney Road cafes, restaurants and Coburg's renowned shopping precinct. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 20 Merribell Avenue, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Urban living on Brunswick fringe
In the heart of it all, this striking, modern complex houses this exceptional apartment. Featuring a roomy, private courtyard, the apartment boasts a carpeted bedroom, a tiled open-plan kitchen and living room plus European laundry. A first home or investment at this price of this calibre will be snapped up quickly!
Featuring secure lift access, gated main entrance with colour-display video intercom, gas cooktop, dishwasher, stone bench, abundance of cabinets, and only 6kms from the CBD, tram at your doorstep, IGA supermarket on ground floor, gas heating, split-system AC and car space.
This marvellous apartment will suit investors, professional couples and downsizers.

Description:
Ideal investment in a handy location
Spacious and modern in design and function, this first floor two bedroom apartment is merely steps to Coburg Village and Coburg Railway Station. A substantial living domain opens via triple stacker doors to a covered balcony for extended entertaining. The kitchen boasts granite counters, glass splashbacks and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Similar indoor-outdoor flow is achieved in the bedrooms (BIRs) with both sharing a balcony and a modern bathroom featuring an oversized shower. Addressing comfort is reverse cycle air conditioning while intercom and undercover parking confirm security. There's also a handy storage cage and a European laundry. Ideal for the investor, starter or downsizer, comfort and style is accompanied by a smorgasbord of amenities at your fingertips.
Rented for $1651 per calendar Month on periodic lease.
Insights: 7/136 Bell Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality and Class with Unbeatable Convenience
In a secure brand-new complex this ground level apartment presents a terrific entry into Coburg or outstanding inner-urban investment opportunity. Impeccably-presented throughout, the home's new interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with built-in robes) and two sleek bathrooms with stone-top vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles, bamboo flooring, light-filled open living/dining area leading out to a huge courtyard. Add to this a classy kitchen with soft-close drawers, Smeg stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights include split-system a/c in all bedrooms and living zone, secure entry foyer and undercover parking space. City-bound trams/trains at your doorstep, it's also close to primary and secondary schools, as well as Sydney Road cafes, restaurants and vibrant shopping precinct. Easy modern living or blue-chip investing! Agent Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Three bedroom period corner home with secure dual car access .
Centrally located, double fronted 3 bedroom home within a short stroll of Coburg Central Shopping, Coburg Rail Station and Sydney Road Tram to the City offers convenience and immediate living. Beautifully refurbished with period detail , the home enjoys Northerly rear yard, decked entertaining area and two living zones.
Accommodation includes:
• Formal entrance hallway
• Three large bedrooms (one with OFP)
• Formal lounge room with OFP
• Central bathroom with huge double shower
• Separate W/C
• Fully equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, pantry and stainless steel appliances
• Adjoining meals area overlooking sunny rear yard with large deck
• Separate laundry
• Carport /covered entertaining area
Featuring: Side access with remote gate, split system heating and cooling throughout, polished timber floors, ornate ceilings and open fire places.
A wonderful opportunity to live in a central location with multiple off street car accommodation and a genuine walk to everything that Coburg has to offer.

Description:
Sale of the Century
Enjoyed by generations of the one family for nearly one hundred years, this authentic shopfront and residence (c1922) presents a truly unique family lifestyle or future development opportunity (STCA) situated on a substantial block of land in the vibrant heart of Coburg. Well-presented throughout, the Californian Bungalow's current floorplan includes three sizeable bedrooms and neat central bathroom, lounge and dining along with a functional kitchen. Add to this a completely original solid-brick shopfront (former shoemaker/cobbling business), as well as a large enclosed patio at the rear, plus a deep backyard with original stables, garage via gated driveway and plenty of room to expand. A prime location walking distance to Nicholson Street/Sydney Road trams, the area's renowned cafes and restaurants, as well as Coburg Station, shops and supermarkets, popular schools, parks and Merri Creek trails. Land approx 13.41m x 40.23m - 539sqm.

Description:
Elevate Your Outlook With Leafy Parkland Views
Relaxing leafy views, sunny aspects, plentiful outdoor space and a position in historic Newlands Estate confer abundant appeal on this elevated, two bedroom, solid brick maisonette in a corner position near the Merri Creek. Warm, inviting and tightly held for over 30 years, the residence offers opportunities to easily add your own touches and is situated on approximately 450m2 opposite parkland. Presenting a lounge, kitchen/meals, northerly sunroom and substantial rear garden featuring green lawns, a storage shed and garage accessed from Meadow Street, it's ready to welcome new residents. A gas stove is the main feature of the kitchen/meals, which welcomes in plentiful northerly sunlight, two double bedrooms with robes include a main bedroom highlighting park views, and there's a central bathroom hosting a shower and bath. The home offers a convenient separate toilet, plus a laundry, and heating and air conditioning also feature. The popular Merri Creek Trail, transport and Coburg High School are a stroll and within a quick drive you'll find both Coburg Market on Sydney Road and modern Coburg Hill Shopping Centre.
Insights: 34 Hutchison Place, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER OFFER
This fully renovated Edwardian home, with a flexible floorplan allowing formal and informal living, comprises three bedrooms, two bathrooms, gourmet kitchen with stone breakfast bar, and meals area. Features an abundance of period detail, leadlight windows, open fireplace, polished floorboards, stained timberwork, plantation shutters, and so much more. Also features paved backyard with a two storey garage/workshop accessed via ROW. Located on the Brunswick border in this fantastic residential location. With so much value, why do the work? You could not buy and renovate this anywhere for this price - invest or move in, the choice is yours. Walking distance to Melville Road trams, Moreland Road buses and Moreland Station, kindergartens and schools, it's also close to popular cafe/shopping precincts as well as easy access to Citylink.

Description:
Spacious Townhouse with AMAZING Courtyard!
You will be immediately impressed by the vaulted ceilings & airy feel at this 2 bedroom townhouse.
Recently refurbished the floor plan includes; spacious, light-filled, open plan living & kitchen with dishwasher & split system. 2 good-sized bedrooms with BIRs plus loft-style study or reading nook. Neat bathroom with bath, laundry fac. Lock up garage on title.
Bi-fold doors lead you to low maintenance, decked courtyard - a fantastic place to share an Aperol Spritz with friends!
In a great location with bus passing door, easy access to major arterials. Approximately 9km to CBD & within the Strathmore School Zone (STA).
As an investment or your first home, this is the one!
Insights: 2/195 Gordon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Only 3 Bedroom On The Block
Live the lifestyle with this lovely apartment that is enviably positioned next to specialty shops and cafes, trams, Batman Station, Coburg Lake Reserve and schools. Offering impressive living room flooded with natural light and split system, a well appointed stylish kitchen/meals with free standing cooker, three large bedrooms serviced by a family bathroom and separate toilet. Abundant internal storage, a separate laundry and car space complete the property. Boasting appeal and location, it makes the ideal starter or addition to any investment portfolio and is perfect for nesters, investors and professionals.

Description:
Executive Lifestyle
Set in a fantastic location, this 2 bedroom townhouse is sure to please.
Open plan living and generous bedrooms. Great for the professional and young family alike.
Accommodation
2 large bedrooms with polished floors and built-in robes
Open plan living in kitchen, dining and lounge
Large central bathroom
Separate laundry
Features
Granite kitchen with stainless steel appliances
Tasmanian oak flooring
Upstairs outdoor entertaining
Large garage plus another spot off street
No body corporate
Close to schools, shops and public transport with very easy access to Citilink.

Description:
Premiere Location, Classic Appeal! - 2 street frontages.
With character-a-plenty, this beautiful, 3 bedroom, weatherboard home is ready to be restored and adored in this fantastic location.
Period features throughout, the current floor plan includes; 3 bedrooms - 2 featuring ornate fireplaces, lounge room & kitchen leading to backyard. Neat bathroom, laundry facilities. ROW + single carport. Extra highlights include high ceilings, original cornices & ceiling rosettes.
Ideal location walking distance to bustling Sydney Road shops, tram, approx. 7.5km to CBD & easy access to Upfield Bike Path.
In need of some updating or extending (STCA), this charmer is one of a kind & not to be missed!
Insights: 5 Woolacott Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Pristine and Positioned to Please
Fantastic lifestyle/investment opportunity located in a popular pocket of Coburg, this immaculate two bedroom villa unit delivers extraordinary low-maintenance living. Part of a tightly held complex, this pristine property showcasing hardwood floors, features spacious living with an excellent kitchen. A private rear incorporating paved alfresco for relaxed outdoor living. Double bedrooms with BIR's enjoy a central bathroom, while heating, cooling, single garage complete this unique property, enviably positioned to lively Sydney Road as well as the Melville road tram.
